title: YouTube slows down video load times when using Firefox
dot:
digraph youtube_slowdown{rankdir=LR;nodesep=0.5;ranksep=1;subgraph cluster_issue{label="Issue: Slow YouTube Load Times in Firefox";fontsize=14;style=filled;color=lightgrey;firefox[label="Firefox", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=orange];slow[label="Slow Loading
(5s delay)", shape=diamond, style="filled", fillcolor=lightcoral];youtube[label="YouTube", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=red];firefox->slow->youtube;}subgraph cluster_solution{label="Solution: Spoof Chrome User-Agent";fontsize=14;style=filled;color=lightgrey; chrome[label="Chrome User-Agent", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightblue];fast[label="Fast Loading", shape=diamond, style="filled", fillcolor=lightgreen];chrome->fast->youtube;}subgraph cluster_cause{label="Suspected Cause:
Anti-Adblock Measures/Browser Discrimination";fontsize=14;style=filled;color=lightgrey;adblock[label="Adblockers
(uBlock Origin)", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightgreen];discrimination[label="Browser
Discrimination", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightcoral];{adblock discrimination}->slow;}workaround[label="Workaround:
uBlock Origin Filters/
User-Agent Switcher", shape=note, style=filled, fillcolor=lightyellow];slow->workaround;workaround->fast;firefox->chrome[label="Spoofing", style=dashed];}

title: OpenAI staff threaten to quit unless board resigns

title: Emmett Shear becomes interim OpenAI CEO as Altman talks break down
dot: digraph OpenAI_Leadership{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightgray, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_board{label="OpenAI Board (Non-profit)";style=filled;fillcolor=lightgoldenrod;"Ilya Sutskever"[fillcolor=coral, tooltip="Chief Scientist, Key role in Altman's ousting"];"Adam D'Angelo"[tooltip="Quora CEO"];"Tasha McCauley"[tooltip="Former GeoSim Systems CEO"];"Helen Toner"[tooltip="Director of Strategy, Georgetown CSET"];}"Sam Altman"[fillcolor=lightblue, tooltip="Former CEO, Fired, then not rehired"];"Greg Brockman"[fillcolor=lightblue, tooltip="Former President"];"Mira Murati"[fillcolor=lightblue, tooltip="Interim CEO, aligned with Altman"];"Emmett Shear"[fillcolor=lightgreen, tooltip="New Interim CEO (from Twitch)"];"Microsoft"[shape=diamond, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, tooltip="Major Investor"];"Ilya Sutskever"->"Sam Altman"[label="Ousted", color=red, style=dashed];"Board"->"Mira Murati"[label="Appointed (Interim)", style=dashed];"Board"->"Emmett Shear"[label="Appointed (Interim)", style=bold];"Sam Altman"->"Microsoft"[label="Joined (New AI team)", color=green];"Greg Brockman"->"Microsoft"[label="Joined (New AI team)", color=green];"Microsoft"->"OpenAI"[label="Investment/Partnership", style=bold];"OpenAI"[shape=house, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgray];{rank=same;"Sam Altman";"Greg Brockman";}}

title: OpenAI's misalignment and Microsoft's gain
dot: digraph OpenAI_Saga{rankdir=TB;nodesep=0.5;ranksep=1;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightblue, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_OpenAI{label="OpenAI (Non-Profit & Capped-Profit)";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"OpenAI Board"[fillcolor=lightcoral, tooltip="Fired Altman, Hired Shear"];"Sam Altman (CEO, Fired)"[fillcolor=lightyellow, tooltip="Joined Microsoft"];"Greg Brockman (Resigned)"[fillcolor=lightyellow, tooltip="Joined Microsoft"];"Ilya Sutskever"[tooltip="Chief Scientist, Led ouster"];"Emmett Shear (New CEO)"[tooltip="Former Twitch CEO"];"ChatGPT"[shape=ellipse, tooltip="Successful product, driver of change"];"OpenAI IP (Pre-AGI)"[shape=ellipse, tooltip="Licensed to Microsoft"];"OpenAI Board"->"Sam Altman (CEO, Fired)"[label="Fires", color=red];"OpenAI Board"->"Greg Brockman (Resigned)"[label="Removes", color=red];"OpenAI Board"->"Emmett Shear (New CEO)"[label="Hires", color=green];"Ilya Sutskever"->"OpenAI Board"[style=dashed, label="Influences", color=grey];"Sam Altman (CEO, Fired)"->"ChatGPT"[label="Developed", color=blue];"OpenAI IP (Pre-AGI)"->"Microsoft"[label="Licensed", color=blue];}subgraph cluster_Microsoft{label="Microsoft";style=filled;color=lightgrey;"Satya Nadella"[tooltip="CEO, Hired Altman & Brockman"];"Microsoft (Azure, etc.)"[shape=ellipse, tooltip="Benefits from OpenAI IP and talent"];"Satya Nadella"->"Sam Altman (CEO, Fired)"[label="Hires", color=green];"Satya Nadella"->"Greg Brockman (Resigned)"[label="Hires", color=green];"Microsoft (Azure, etc.)"->"OpenAI Board"[label="Funds/Compute", style=dashed, color=grey];}"OpenAI Board"->"OpenAI IP (Pre-AGI)"[label="Owns", color=blue];{rank=same;"Sam Altman (CEO, Fired)";"Greg Brockman (Resigned)";}}
